//! Unicode Hangul Syllable Type mapping.

pub const Kind = enum {
    L,
    T,
    V,
    LV,
    LVT,
};

const HangulMap = @This();

/// syllableType maps the code point to its Hangul Syllable Type.
pub fn syllableType(self: HangulMap, cp: u21) ?Kind {
